game.name: Cannon Hero
game.description:
Join Cannon Hero and grab a chance to play the role of a boy who is determined enough to save the world from the horde of evil troopers! This brand new action game will also allow you to become a cannon hero. We are damn sure that you would not like to lose such wonderful opportunities. The entire platform is full of enemies who are not going to show sympathy on you. Try to be very rude by shooting all of them as you spot them! 
Your enemies will stand on the platform with different heights. Try to shoot your missile on them before making sure that it is set at the right angle! Every successful shot will help you get some coins in this free action game. You can use a great amount of coins to buy new characters and improve the power of your character. It will be amazing to control a boy who has its own mighty cannon in this cool arcade game. 
It is up to in your hands that how quickly you eliminate these bad souls by shooting them perfectly. You will have the sufficient time to make them disappear from their small and tall towers. Use your shooting ability to clear the area from these terrible monsters! Try to shoot them with precision and accuracy as they will release the rocket and eliminate you shortly if you miss your shot! Use different character modes and enjoy the amazing upgrades like shields! Check out more arcade physics games to beat your boring hours online for free!
